com.tencent.tavmedia

类 TAVComposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.tavmedia.TAVSerializable
      • com.tencent.tavmedia.TAVClip
        • com.tencent.tavmedia.TAVMedia
          • com.tencent.tavmedia.TAVMovie
            • com.tencent.tavmedia.TAVComposition

  • public class TAVComposition
extends TAVMovie
    An object that combines and arranges clips into a single composite clip that you can play or process.
